allow: Bash(ssh user@taurus.microgeni.synology.me "pgrep softKM && ps aux | grep softKM | grep -v grep")

Bash(# Quick test - send heartbeat and capture response immediately
{ printf ''\\x4B\\x53\\x01\\xF0\\x00\\x00\\x00\\x00''; sleep 1; })
Bash(# Check various possible log locations ls -la /tmp/softKM.log || echo ""Not in /tmp"" ls -la $TMPDIR/softKM.log || echo ""Not in TMPDIR"" echo ""TMPDIR is: $TMPDIR"" ps aux)
Bash(# Find any softKM logs find /var/folders -name ""softKM.log"")
Bash(echo "No log at /tmp/softKM.log" echo "" echo "=== Looking in TMPDIR ===" cat "$TMPDIR/softKM.log")
Bash(# Check what''s connecting to port 24800 lsof -i :24800 || echo ""Nothing found"" netstat -an)
Bash(# Start softKM on macOS open /Applications/softKM.app sleep 5 # Check macOS logs cat ""$TMPDIR/softKM.log"")
Bash(# Restart macOS app pkill -x softKM sleep 1 open /Applications/softKM.app sleep 5 # Check logs find /var/folders -name ""softKM.log"")
Bash(# Check the latest macOS log for accessibility status find /var/folders -name ""softKM.log"")
Bash(# Check for accessibility messages in the log find /var/folders -name ""softKM.log"")
